sentences.sContent: $15 for two beers seems a little excessive.
sentences.sCn: 两杯啤酒要15美元，似乎有点过分。

sentences.sContent: ...people should be cautious of the excessive use of computers for the following reasons...
...excessive packaging can make the majority of merchants get high profit for the cheap commodity by improving price...
...the problem of excessive packaging has aroused people’s wide concern...
...No single online activity is to blame for excessive use...
...About 6% of respondents reported that: their relationships suffered because of excessive Internet use...
...People who struggle with excessive Internet use maybe depressed or have other mood disorders...
...a study published in CNS Spectrums claimed to be the first large-scale look at excessive Internet use...

phrases.pCn: 过度噪音；过分的吵闹声
过剩需求；过量需求；需求过旺

words.tran: 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制

trans.tranOther: much more than is reasonable or necessary
